reviewText: One of my favs!  This has an epic soundtack and amazing surfing on the North Shore. This is one you need to have! If you love surf as much as I do, you gotta get this one. You won't be bummed!!!  Love this!

Wow- got this DVD as a gift for Christmas and was shocked at how awesome the surf footage was. Most epic barrels for like 45 minutes straight. Def worth the buy- especially if you get it for free as a gift
